Fix sphinx build error on readthedocs.org (#175)

Problem
-------

RTD does "pip install --upgrade sphinx<2" (...), before "pip install -r docs/requirements.txt", which says "already satisfied" in regards to "Sphinx". But `sphinx_paramlinks` since 0.4.0, is only compatible with `Sphinx>3`,

this line, https://github.com/sqlalchemyorg/sphinx-paramlinks/commit/3fab7d0964722ccc60b13073d019cf73df16ae83#diff-abe84b8e411ab7bd367ad033685b2b5dR31

raises `KeyError` for Sphinx less than version 3.

Solution
--------
freeze dependencies, to ensure successful RTD builds again. Also, add myself for notifications from RTD so that I get e-mail notified next time!

verification.payload:
tree c0cd14ed4cf28986a8d1a02d320244c931120183
parent 83748bd9e97f9f2fd849588e677d541e162e3fc6
parent dde18be144fcf3c6ec1567131107ec9aabc97187
author Jeff Quast <contact@jeffquast.com> 1592399688 -0400
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1592399688 -0400

Fix sphinx build error on readthedocs.org (#175)

Problem
-------

RTD does "pip install --upgrade sphinx<2" (...), before "pip install -r docs/requirements.txt", which says "already satisfied" in regards to "Sphinx". But `sphinx_paramlinks` since 0.4.0, is only compatible with `Sphinx>3`,

this line, https://github.com/sqlalchemyorg/sphinx-paramlinks/commit/3fab7d0964722ccc60b13073d019cf73df16ae83#diff-abe84b8e411ab7bd367ad033685b2b5dR31

raises `KeyError` for Sphinx less than version 3.

Solution
--------
freeze dependencies, to ensure successful RTD builds again. Also, add myself for notifications from RTD so that I get e-mail notified next time!

commit.message:
Fix sphinx errors on readthedocs.org

RTD does "pip install --upgrade sphinx<2" (...),
before "pip install -r docs/requirements.txt",
which says "already satisfied" in regards to "Sphinx"
But sphinx_paramlinks since 0.4.0, is only compatible with '>3',

this line:
https://github.com/sqlalchemyorg/sphinx-paramlinks/commit/3fab7d0964722ccc60b13073d019cf73df16ae83#diff-abe84b8e411ab7bd367ad033685b2b5dR31

raises KeyError for Sphinx less than version 3.
So we freeze our dependencies for docs, to ensure successful RTD builds
again. Also added myself for notifications from RTD so that I get e-mail
notified next time!

commit.message: __version__ 1.17.3

Docfiix and detail some (y, x), (x, y) confusion, bugfix Pickles (#157)

- bugfix "pickleability" of FormatOtherString, by implementing ``__getnewargs__``, with tests.
- remove `.landscape.yml`, no longer used.
- rewrite the messages of our TypeError's, hopefully these are easier to understand.
- docfix some confusion about (y, x), (row, column), etc. There were some backwards things, and it's pretty annoying that get_location() doesn't match location(), we document why -- to retain API compatibility with blessings!
- add `pixel_height` and `pixel_width`, for libsixel support or general curiosity, it actually works on most of the terminals I tested! This wasn't the case several years ago, closes #155

verification.payload:
tree 627d232861b98deb3569e70e85c2bfe3b54de836
parent 22eec83109d03056f84ba220e255afb800f889d3
author Jeff Quast <contact@jeffquast.com> 1584690021 -0700
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1584690021 -0700

Docfiix and detail some (y, x), (x, y) confusion, bugfix Pickles (#157)

- bugfix "pickleability" of FormatOtherString, by implementing ``__getnewargs__``, with tests.
- remove `.landscape.yml`, no longer used.
- rewrite the messages of our TypeError's, hopefully these are easier to understand.
- docfix some confusion about (y, x), (row, column), etc. There were some backwards things, and it's pretty annoying that get_location() doesn't match location(), we document why -- to retain API compatibility with blessings!
- add `pixel_height` and `pixel_width`, for libsixel support or general curiosity, it actually works on most of the terminals I tested! This wasn't the case several years ago, closes #155
